IN RE: the Termination of the Parent-Child Relationship of V.G. and C.G. (Minor Children) and M.G. (Mother) and E.G. (Father) M.G. (Mother) and E.G. (Father), Appellants-Respondents,
v.
The Indiana Department of Child Services, Appellee-Petitioner Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-JT-1170 Court of Appeals of Indiana. November 30, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

VAIDIK , C.J.

Affirmed.

RILEY, J., Concurs.

KIRSCH, J., Concurs.
